function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent information disclosure about the pandemic","Impact":"Confusion and misinformation among the public, leading to higher risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Establish clear and transparent communication channels for information dissemination","Technologies":"Public health communication platforms, social media monitoring tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Conflicting political views on pandemic response and impact","Impact":"Ineffective and delayed measures to control the spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Facilitate bipartisan collaboration and consensus-building on public health policies","Technologies":"Collaborative decision-making platforms, data-driven impact assessment tools","People":"Political leaders, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffective technical systems for coordinated public policies","Impact":"Slow and inefficient disaster management and response","Mitigation":"Invest in technological infrastructure for data sharing and decision-making, Improve interoperability of public health systems","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, interoperable health information systems","People":"Government officials, public health administrators","Owner":"Public health departments and technology providers"}]}
